post.summary: Refresh access token using refresh token

get.summary: Get balance history for a user

put.summary: Update decision (only if no votes yet)

delete.summary: Cancel payment (by sender, only if pending)

get.summary: Get user by ID (for viewing other users in colocation)

optionIndices.title: Can vote for multiple if allow_multiple

isGlobal.title: true if global category, false if custom

isSettled.title: Whether this split has been settled

colocNotificationType.title:
- NOTIFICATION_TYPE_EXPENSE_CREATED: Expense notifications
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PAYMENT_RECEIVED: Payment notifications
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_MEMBER_JOINED: Colocation notifications
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_DECISION_CREATED: Decision notifications
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_FUND_CREATED: Fund notifications
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_EVENT_CREATED: Event notifications
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_RECURRING_DUE: Recurring expense notifications

colocSplitType.title:
- SPLIT_TYPE_EQUAL: Equal split among all members
 - SPLIT_TYPE_PERCENTAGE: Custom percentage per member
 - SPLIT_TYPE_CUSTOM: Fixed amount per member

netBalance.title: Positive = others owe them, Negative = they owe others
